definitions: occurring in or relating to the period after marriage

examples.text: expect to see plenty of Galliano's gowns at the postnuptial balls

shortDefinitions: occurring in or relating to period after marriage

definitions: occurring in or relating to the period after the mating season of an animal

examples.text: they complete their postnuptial molt before the March freeze-up

shortDefinitions: occurring in or relating to period after mating season of animal
